idea-plugin.name: Java Controller Finder
idea-plugin.description:
This Plugin allows to quickly navigate to a controller method that matches: - either a selected text or - a text from clipboard (selected text gets precedence)
It is oriented towards Spring Controller's, should work with `@Path` annotations as well.

Just copy the url you want to find, switch to intellij and right click -> select 'Find Controller)
(or use shortcut "CTRL + ALT + A")
